TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AnnouncementService extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A self-hosted implementation of the announcement service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class listens for incoming messages on a standard announcement endpoint (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementEndpoint>) and provides event notification when Hello or Bye announcement messages arrive. You can provide a custom announcement service implementation by deriving from this class.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Docs.param: The maximum number of message hashes used by the transport for identifying duplicate messages. The default value is 0.

abstract member OnBeginOfflineAnnouncement : System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence * System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata * AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult override this.OnBeginOfflineAnnouncement : System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence * System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata * AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult

Docs.param: The position of this message in the sequence for the current notification.
An object that provides endpoint metadata, for example scopes, listen URI, contract names, and endpoint address.
The method to call when the asynchronous operation is complete.
Docs.summary: Starts the processing of incoming offline announcement (Bye) messages.
Docs.returns: The status of the pending asynchronous request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Classes that inherit from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementService> to implement a custom announcement listener service must override this method and begin to process incoming Bye messages.

Docs.summary: Starts the processing of incoming online announcement (Hello) messages.
Docs.returns: The status of the pending asynchronous request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Classes that inherit from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.AnnouncementService> to implement a custom announcement listener service must override this method and begin to process incoming Hello messages.
